member.name: T:ArepaMocks.TestValidDocumentationWith2Scenario1Feature.AddTwoNumbers
member.remarks: As lazy user I want to add two numbers so that I don't need to use my brain

member.name: M:ArepaMocks.TestValidDocumentationWith2Scenario1Feature.AddTwoNumbers.Add_Two_Valid_Numbers
member.remarks: Given a new Add Calculator When I enter two numbers on screen Then the result on the screen should be the sum of those two numbers

member.name: M:ArepaMocks.TestValidDocumentationWith2Scenario1Feature.AddTwoNumbers.AddTwoInvalidNumbers
member.remarks: Given a new Add Calculator When I enter the first value as an invalid number OR I enter the send value as an invalid number Then the result on the screen should be an error
